content:
FILE_WRITTEN:scripts/entrypoint.sh
DIR_STATE:["scripts/README_build_runner.md", "scripts/_build_logging.py", "scripts/build_runner.py", "scripts/build_steps.py", "scripts/check_artifact_gate.py", "scripts/ci_expectations.json", "scripts/ci_run.py", "scripts/ci_verify_outputs.py", "scripts/consolidate_outputs.py", "scripts/create_meta_analysis_starter_kit.py", "scripts/docker_healthcheck.sh", "scripts/entrypoint.sh", "scripts/id_mismatch_demo.py", "scripts/logging_utils.py", "scripts/path_utils.py", "scripts/pipeline_runner.py", "scripts/preflight_diagnostics.py", "scripts/record_versions.py", "scripts/run.py", "scripts/run_artifact_gate.py", "scripts/smoke_test.py", "scripts/toy_meta_analysis.py", "scripts/validate_json.py"]
SUMMARY: Added a strict, deterministic Bash entrypoint that captures an environment manifest, runs a smoke-test, and then execs the runner with robust discovery and error handling.
